text:
Under 2.0.36, the AddLanguage and LanguagePriority directives use "kr" for 
Korean.  It should be "ko"  In MS Internet Explorer, under Internet Options-
>Languages and under Netscape Preferences->Navigator->Languages it is listed as 
Korean (ko).

Since this bug is straightforward, could the fix please go into 2.0.37?
creator: robertlaferla@attbi.com
wrowe@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9763 ***
